summary: Client requested Sarah to start a requirements meeting. Developer, Architect, and QA did not comment; PM asked what the project should be called.

actions.task: Propose or decide the project name

risks.risk: Key stakeholders (Developer, Architect, QA) did not provide input, risking incomplete or delayed requirements gathering
risks.mitigation: Follow up with non-responsive stakeholders, confirm required attendees, and schedule the requirements meeting with pre-meeting prep and assigned inputs.
